instruction: Classify if the following sentence is a metaphor or a simile. Output 1 for metaphor and 0 for simile.
input: He was as quiet as a mouse.

instruction: Try to rephrase the sentence using a different grammatical structure while preserving the same meaning.
input: She will have to finish the work by tomorrow.
output: The work must be completed by tomorrow.

instruction: Replace the bold words with an appropriate synonym.
input: He was so bored that he almost fell asleep.
output: He was so uninterested that he almost dozed off.

instruction: Output 1 if the sentence is interrogative, and 0 if the sentence is declarative.
Given a sentence, output the Future Perfect Tense of the verb in the sentence.
output: He will have read the book.

instruction: Output 1 if the sentence is stating an opinion, and 0 if it is questioning something.
Create an outline of key points to discuss in a 5-minute talk about the benefits of traveling.
output:
I. Introduction 
A. Definition of traveling 
B. Benefits of traveling 

II. Learning about Cultures
A. Gaining perspective and empathy 
B. Enhancing language skills 

III. Exploring New Places 
A. Engaging with unique attractions 
B. Creating lasting memories 

IV. Meeting New People 
A. Connecting with locals through conversation 
B. Networking with people in the same field 

V. Conclusion 
A. Summarize key points of the talk 
B. Stress the importance of traveling

instruction: Describe a new hair styling technique in a 2-sentence description.
output: The Glamour Wash is an innovative hair styling technique that involves washing the hair in a particular pattern to create a voluminous and glamorous look. The technique requires working a mousse or wax through the hair into loose strands that are lifted and dried to create a textured and sleek finish.

instruction: On a scale from 1 to 5, rate the sentiment of the sentence.
input: I had a great time at the beach today.

instruction: Change the tense of the sentence from the past to future.
output: I will go to the store.

instruction: List 3 well-known facts about Albert Einstein.
output:
1. Albert Einstein is best known for his theory of relativity.
2. He was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1921.
3. He is widely considered to be one of the most influential scientists of the 20th century.

instruction: Rewrite the sentence using parallel structure.
input: His mother was respected for her intelligence and was known for her kindness.
output: His mother was respected for her intelligence and renowned for her kindness.

instruction: Insert commas in the sentence to increase readability.
input: The man eating the hot dog stopped to order french fries.
output: The man, eating the hot dog, stopped to order french fries.

instruction: Capitalize the appropriate words in the sentence.
input: The wind is blowing through the trees.
output: The Wind is blowing through the Trees.

instruction: Tag the entities in the sentence.
input: Bill Gates is the founder of Microsoft.
output: [Bill Gates] - Person [Microsoft] - Organization

instruction: Summarize the sentence in one word.
input: He lost his favorite dog and was devastated.
output: Devastated.

instruction: Suggest a creative name for a new clothing line.
output: Classy Threads.

instruction: Make a list of healthy meal options to pack for lunch.
output:
- Whole grain wrap filled with grilled chicken, spinach, bell peppers, and ranch dressing.
- Hummus and vegetable wrap with spinach, carrots, bell peppers, and lettuce.
- Grilled salmon served atop a bed of leafy greens.
- Greek yogurt bowl with fresh fruit and whole grain granola.
- Quinoa bowl with chicken, avocado, roasted vegetables and vinaigrette.
- Black bean burger with vegetables and avocado on a whole wheat bun.
- Greek salad with feta, olives, cucumbers, tomatoes and olive oil.
- Tomato and mozzarella sandwich on whole wheat toast.
- Spinach and mushroom omelet with toast.
- Vegetable soup with crackers or grilled cheese sandwich.
- Curried chickpea salad with feta and quinoa.
- Almond butter and banana sandwich on whole wheat bread.

instruction: Write an email for a job inquiry.
input:
Company Name: Tesla
Position: Technical Support Engineer
output:
Dear Hiring Manager, 

I am writing to express my interest in the Technical Support Engineer position at Tesla. I believe that my technical experience and customer service skills make me the perfect fit for this position. 

I have over 5 years of experience in technical support roles, and am highly skilled in offering solutions to technical problems quickly and effectively. I have a detailed understanding of multiple customer service techniques, and can provide exceptional customer service to any customer. 

I have also had experience in roles that require customer relationship management. I am able to effectively and efficiently handle customer inquiries, follow up with customers, and work hard to ensure their satisfaction.

I believe I would be the perfect candidate for the Technical Support Engineer position at Tesla. I am confident in my abilities and eager to take on any challenge you may have.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]

instruction: Come up with 5 new ideas for a product design.
output:
- A product that combines headphones and a Bluetooth speaker into one device. 
- A phone case with a built-in solar battery charger.
- A multi functional laptop, smartphone, and tablet all in one device.
- A wearable fitness assistant that tracks your heart rate and activity levels.
- A smart kitchen appliance that automatically orders groceries and meal plans.

instruction: Suggest 5 ideas to improve the customer experience.
output:
- Offer personalized customer service.
- Provide 24/7 customer support. 
- Implement customer feedback surveys. 
- Utilize data gathered from customer interactions to improve the customer experience. 
- Offer discounts and incentives to customers.

instruction: Formulate a hypothesis for a given experiment.
input: Investigate the effect of fertilizer on the growth of plants
output: The hypothesis for this experiment is that plants given fertilizer will have a higher rate of growth than plants that are not given fertilizer.

instruction: Write a job posting for a program assistant.
input:
Company Name: ABC
Location: Seattle, WA
output:
ABC is seeking an experienced Program Assistant to join our team in Seattle, WA. The Program Assistant will be responsible for developing, coordinating and implementing various program initiatives and special events.

The ideal candidate should possess excellent organizational and communication skills, as well as the ability to effectively manage multiple tasks. The Program Assistant will be responsible for managing office operations, including filing and data entry, and providing administrative support to the program team. This position will also involve assisting with grant writing and grant funding research, as well as supervising volunteers and interns.
 
To be considered for this role, you should have a high school diploma or equivalent and 2+ years of experience working in an administrative or program support role. Experience in grant writing and grant research is strongly preferred.

If you have the required qualifications and are interested in joining a fast-paced and growing organization, please apply today!

instruction: Name ten animals that live in a tropical rainforest.
output:
- Sloth 
- Tapir 
- Gorilla 
- Jaguar 
- Macaw 
- Poison dart frog 
- Anaconda 
- Ocelot 
- Toucan 
- Poison arrow frog

instruction: Find the most cost effective way to ship these goods from China to the United States.
input: 4000 lbs of goods, shipping time is 10 days, shipping cost must not exceed $5000
output: The most cost effective way to ship these goods from China to the United States would be to send them by ocean freight with a consolidator, as this will provide the best balance between cost, time and reliability. The estimated cost for shipping 4000 lbs for 10 days is about $3000-$4000, which is well under the stated budget of $5000.
